room_title: Escape room "Monsters in the Closet" by Breakin’ The Code in Houma
room_description: Seth always said that there were monsters in his closet. He could hear things go bump in the night. He could see eyes peering at him from across the room. In an effort to make Seth feel better, every night before he was tucked into bed his parents would go look around his room to prove to him that there were no monsters. Tonight Seth’s parents are gone and you are his sitter. It is up to you to show Seth he has nothing to be afraid of. BUMP! What was that? What if Seth was right?
